## FeatureLoadersRegistry.getFeatureDependencies() method

returns all the dependencies of a feature. doesn't handle duplications

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getFeatureDependencies(featureName: string): Promise<string[]>;
```

| featureName | string |             |
